name: 4 Games
description:
Play 4 games at once!
Meet the super arcade collection - 4 in 1. Immediately 4 cool games in one application. Play on any, even the weakest device. The game will take up little space, but will bring a lot of fun! New anti-stress like squishy or slime, sequin. The best mini-games for boys and girls. Choose what you want: arcade, simulator, puzzles, action, anti-stress - play yourself and show your friends.
Bright graphics! Varied gameplay! And the fun multiplied by 4!
- Jump the ball on the helix-colored platforms!
- Throw knives in 3D!
- Jump the ball through the rings along the road!
- Draw happy lines and fill the glass with a drop!
Play and earn coins, buy new balls, improve slime, collect knives and much more. Complete all the games right now!
